text: I Walk Alone is a 1947 American crime drama movie directed by Byron Haskin and was based on the play Beggars Are Coming to Town by Theodore Reeves. It stars Burt Lancaster, Lizabeth Scott, Wendell Corey, Kirk Douglas, Marc Lawrence, Kristie Miller and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1947 crime drama movies Category:1940s American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Byron Haskin
title: I Walk Alone
